AQER stands for Artificial-Intelligence Quotation for Entertainment Rights
and is the first smart marketplace where Vloggers and Brands meet.

Token sale

Telegram

AQER’s vision is to introduce dedicated marketplaces where content seekers and
content creators interests meet and synergise, exploiting the combined benefits of
Blockchain and Artificial-Intelligence technologies.

Why it is needed?

Videos dominate today’s market

87% of online marketers use video content according to Outbrain.

Visuals are quicker to grasp

90% of information transmitted to the brain is visual, and visuals are processed 60,000X faster in the brain than text.

Mobile views are increasing

Mobile and tablet shoppers are three times as likely to view a video as laptop or desktop users.

Youtube’s powerful influence

More than 1 billion unique users visit YouTube each month, spending more than 4 billion hours watching videos.

The Solution

VLOGGERS

Will promote advertising on their channel through AQER. They choose their campaigns, then create content. Once new content has been validated from the brand, it posts to whatever social media platforms the vlogger is part of. If content gets rejected, vloggers are still able to replace it with new content.

Read more

BRANDS

Brands contact Vloggers to commission content and create cost-efficient video marketing campaigns to boost their products and services. Brands can easily identify, engage and pay the perfectly matching Vloggers, by considering the vloggers’ Key Performance Indicators such as ranking, number of followers, amount of interactions, views or/and others. Brands pay less, Vloggers earn more, as intermediaries are no longer required.

Read more

To accomplish our mission, we benefit from key aspects of blockchain technology:

AQER is transparent

Transactions through the platform are
visible to all participants, thus ensuring
transparency in operations.

AQER is immutable

The information already included in the
platform cannot be changed. It’s
interesting to note that the …more

AQER is decentralized

The whole system of buying and selling
advertising space, the quotations of
individual video channels, and …more
